skillTree.name: Tolerance to Toxins
skillTree.description: Regular consumption of rotten meat and toxins are the staples of a healthy Ogre diet.

skillTree.name: Horrific Stench
skillTree.description: The reeking odour seeping from this one's every pore would offend any creature with a nose, and several without.

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Lucky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.

skillTree.name: Blessed by the Great Maw
skillTree.description: Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Enslaved Spirits
skillTree.description: Those caught in the web of Braugh's chains find their spirits twisted and captured, bound to his befouling purpose, and forced into combat wailing and screaming.

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Enslaved Spirits

skillTree.name: Life Leech
skillTree.description: Whenever a unit dies in Braugh's presence, some of its energy is leeched away by the necrotic Ogre via his foul, unearthly chains.

ui_effects.description: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.name: Enslave
skillTree.description: Wreathed in the evil power of Dhar, Braugh's mere prescence - and the threat of eternal enslavement it poses - is enough to make his enemies cower in fear.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Choice Target
skillTree.description: Soemtimes, a particular slave-to-be catches Braugh's eye. The poor bugger will wish that had never happened.

skillTree.name: Drain Vitality
skillTree.description: The necromantic chains that bind Braugh to his victims clamp into their very souls, allowing him to draw from their energy and preserve his own.

skillTree.name: Violent Disruptor
skillTree.description: Braugh forces the unruliest of spirits into a state of explosive deconstruction, casting them into the fray as they rip themselves asunder in dangerous bursts.

skillTree.name: Enchained Creations
skillTree.description: Dying in Braugh's presence offers no release, but is merely another way to be captured and tortured - to be transformed into a battery of magical energy under his hateful eye.

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Auroral Eidolons
Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.name: Corruptive Captor
skillTree.description: Both the bodies and souls of those slain by Braugh are tied to him by his unholy chains, entrapped and forced to serve his foul being.

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Enraged Corpses

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Slavelord
backgroundSkills.description: Braugh Slavelord deals not only in flesh but in spirits, trading the services of the quick and the dead to whoever pays the right price, an army of unquiet ghosts and walking corpses shambling meekly in his wake.

effects.description:
Meat gained from battles: +20%
	(all units in army)
